event: Delhi was engulfed in the worst fog of the season; transport disrupted.
Telangana started providing uninterrupted free power supply to 2.3 million agricultural consumers.
Clashes between Dalits and Marathas during Koregaon Bhima victory celebrations; schools shut, riots spread.
290,000 doctors went on strike protesting the National Medical Commission Bill.
Finance Minister Arun Jaitley declared cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin as not legal tender.
GDP growth for 2017-18 estimated at 6.5%, slower due to GST transition and agrarian distress.
IED blast killed 4 policemen in Sopore.
CBI court sentenced Lalu Prasad Yadav to jail for Fodder Scam case.
Avalanche killed 11 people in Kupwara district.
Law Minister talked about freedom of the press amid Aadhaar data FIR controversy.
Supreme Court reversed mandatory playing of National Anthem in movie halls.
Kathua rape and murder case surfaced.
